page.title: 06LEISURE TIME IN DENTON
page.content: One of the major complaints that the young people of{West Denton}and {Danebank}have is that there is nothing for them to do in their leisure time. In what is essentially first a residential and second an industrial area there may be some truth in this complaint. There are no youth clubs or similer leisure centres for the young who consequently are left to make their own entertainment. This has resulted in some vandalism as the older residents only too readily point out. They complain of gangs of youths roaming the streets disturbing the peace of the area and causing trouble with youths from other districts.For the older residents it is easier to find recreation in the form of a golf ,publicparks,a public house two social clubs and a community centre.This imbalance concerns all.
